tool.name: Mouse to Human Table
tool.description: Combines a table of Mouse and Human samples via a phenotype association

param.name: dictionary
param.label: Dictionary file
param.help: The file with the human to mouse gene association.

param.name: human_table
param.label: Human Table
param.help: The file with the human sample output

param.name: mouse_table
param.label: Mouse Table
param.help: The file with the mouse sample output

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Takes in three files. One with a phenotype association of mouse to human where the first column is the human gene id, and the fourth is the mouse gene id. And two sample table files, one for mouse and one for human. It will output three files: a table with acombination of all data for genes present in both lab sample files, a table of genes only in the mouse and a table only in the human.
